text: Arthur O'Sullivan (born 1953) is an American economist, Professor of Economics at Lewis & Clark College, and author of college textbooks on economics. ==Works== ;Sole author * Urban Economics, Irwin / McGraw-Hill Series in Urban Economics, 1990 (First Edition) – 2008 (Seventh Edition). ;With Steven M. Sheffrin * Economics: Principles in Action, Pearson Prentice Hall, 2003. * Microeconomics: Principles and Tools, Prentice-Hall, 2004. ==References== Category:21st-century American economists Category:Living people Category:1953 births Category:Lewis & Clark College faculty
title: Arthur O'Sullivan (economist)
